name: The Winter Orange Harvest
description:
The Winter Orange Harvest is a short game where you play as Orvil The Orange trying to save the helpless oranges as soon as possible so they don't freeze this winter. This game was made in a few hours as just a way to test out the game engine I am working in. (BTW my best time is 10.72 seconds so try and beat that if you can!)

Controls: 

Left Arrow - Move left

Right Arrow - Move right

Space Bar - Jump

Credits: 

All art assets come from the GDevelop 5 asset store.

All programming, design, audio, and pretty much everything other than art was done by Jacob Norber.
